entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@JoeBiden Joe Bidenさん、your constant concern on Covid-19 crises and firm、strong advisement to wear mask is very positively encouraging、epitome of rasionality heeded by so many、keep up that awesomeness、 stay healthy kay Onii-chan😆

We're rooting for you、future Hokage ahaha. https://t.co/74uuJ3WlXj
